spirituality connects us all over this

you know I like to think of our thoughts
like drops of water one thought does not
mean very much it's like one drop of
water on this stage but I'm told that we
think about sixty thousand thoughts a
day and unfortunately most of them are
the thoughts we had yesterday and the
day before and the day before and the
day before but you know if you think of
these thoughts keep dropping and
dropping sixty thousand a day pretty
soon you can have a little puddle a
little Pond a small Lake almost an ocean
and if our thinking is negative we can
drown in a sea of negativity or we can
float on the ocean of life it is up to
us up to us totally I think I have
taught myself to think primarily in
positive affirmations and yes it is a
little bit of work to change our
thinking to be conscious of it to be
aware of what we think and what we
believe but once we can do that it makes
a tremendous difference now you know we
talk about affirmations a lot which are
positive statements but what people
don't realize is that every thought we
think and every word we speak is an
affirmation you've been doing
affirmations all your life but you've
been doing them unconsciously and a lot
of them have been very negative so we
need to look at what is it we really
believe so we can make the changes and
that's why I say to people take a large
piece of paper and write on the top of
it what I believe about men and then
take another piece what I believe about
women another piece what I believe about
children what I believe about life work
finances marriage relationships
money Health aging the church my family
and just start writing things down
whatever comes to your head no matter
how foolish it is write it down write it
down and it may take you almost a week
of going back to these papers to finish
them but when you see them and start
looking at the list of what you believe
you will be amazed and some things that
come up you'll say oh I couldn't believe
that but if it comes up there is a part
of you somewhere in there that does
believe that so then you want to look at
your list for all the negative things
that you believe and may either make a
decision to eliminate them totally let
them go you know ask yourself is this
belief I want to have run my life and
then turn those negative things into
positive affirmations once you see what
you believe you'll know the things that
support you and are very good and
powerful for you and you will also see
the things that are undermining you the
beliefs that are keeping you from having
what you say you want
